message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I believe it's worth a substantial amount, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at $900000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in your product. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item, but based on my research and budget, I am proposing an offer of $750000. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still confident that it's worth more than $750000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $850000. I believe this price is more in line with its true value, and I'm open to further negotiation if you're willing to meet me halfway.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your perspective on the product's value. After careful consideration, I would like to propose an offer of $800000. This aligns closely with my budget and what I believe the product is worth. I hope this offer is acceptable.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $800000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $850000 and $800000, so I'm offering it to you for $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's unique features and value.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my assessment and budget constraints, I would like to propose an offer of $810000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's unique features and my financial situation. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $810000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $820000. I believe this is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my initial asking price.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, and I respect your valuation of the product. Based on my research and budget, I would like to propose an offer of $815000. I believe this is a fair compromise given the unique features of the product and my financial constraints. I hope this offer is acceptable.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $815000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $825000. I believe this is the final price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my initial asking price.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I've considered all the factors, and I believe the product is indeed valuable. However, I must respectfully decline your offer of $825000. I am unable to meet you at that price point. I suggest we conclude our negotiations here. I will now proceed to purchase the product from John for $800000.
